name: PATHFINDER AVIATION PTY LTD
about: PathFinder Aviation Pty Ltd, located at Archerfield Airport in Brisbane, is a premier flying school dedicated to providing professional and affordable flight training. Founded in 2011 by Chief Flying Instructor David Stehbens, the school offers a range of programs from beginner flights to commercial pilot licenses. Our instructors, known for their relaxed and supportive approach, ensure students learn in a safe and enjoyable environment. We guarantee a comprehensive training program with fixed-price lessons, no hidden extras, and the use of in-cockpit cameras for review. Our mission is to turn motivated individuals into great pilots, emphasizing value, safety, and fun. Join us to start your flying journey with confidence and enthusiasm.
services:
["RA-Aus Pilot Certificate 
Recreational Pilot Licence 
Private Pilot Licence
Night VFR
Commercial Pilot Licence"]
